title: SolviroStudio extra-long single-page portfolio (React + TS + Tailwind + shadcn/ui + React Query)

requirements.summary: Implement an extra-long single-page layout with sticky anchor navigation (7 items) and scroll-spy active section highlighting.
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation displays the 7 specified items in the specified order.
Clicking a nav item scrolls smoothly to the correct section.
Active section state is visually indicated in the nav while scrolling.
Page includes all listed sections and is clearly “extra long” (i.e., substantial vertical content beyond a minimal landing page).

file_operations.description: Create the single-page app composition with 7 anchored sections (Home, Portfolio, About Us, Services, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact Us), ensuring each section has a stable id for anchor scrolling and enough content blocks to feel extra-long.

Add a sticky top navigation component with the 7 specified items in order, smooth anchor scrolling, and an active state. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., NavigationMenu/Button) to ensure consistent, accessible interactions. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement scroll-spy logic (IntersectionObserver-based) that tracks which section is active and exposes it to the sticky nav for highlighting.
Add global CSS to enable smooth scrolling behavior and baseline layout styling that supports sticky header offsets for anchor navigation.
Create a reusable section wrapper that standardizes spacing, max-width, responsive padding, and optional section separators to keep the page cohesive and extra-long.

requirements.summary: Build the Home (Hero) section with exact headline/subheadline, gradient background, and primary CTA that scrolls to Contact Us.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section shows the exact headline and subheadline strings.
Hero background is a visible gradient using the specified three colors.
Hero includes a prominent “Get Started Now” button that scrolls to Contact Us (or opens the Contact section).

file_operations.description: Implement the Home/Hero section with the exact provided headline and subheadline strings, a background gradient using #FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00, and a “Get Started Now” CTA that scrolls to the Contact Us section. Use shadcn-ui Button for the CTA. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire HeroSection into the top of the single-page layout and ensure the “Get Started Now” CTA scroll target matches the Contact Us section id.

requirements.summary: Apply the SolviroStudio brand accent colors and a consistent primary CTA gradient across the site; ensure CTAs exist in every major section.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary CTA styling uses the specified gradient and is visually consistent across sections.
Every major section includes at least one clearly visible button CTA.
No other accent color palette overrides the provided brand colors for CTAs/highlights.

file_operations.description: Extend Tailwind theme tokens to include SolviroStudio brand colors (#FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00) and expose a reusable gradient token/utility approach for primary CTAs.
Define global CSS variables and/or utility composition classes to standardize the primary CTA gradient (#FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00), plus accessible focus/hover states that keep text readable.

Create a shared CTA button wrapper that applies the consistent SolviroStudio gradient treatment and is reused across Hero, About, Services, Portfolio, Client Results, Testimonials, and Contact sections. Use shadcn-ui Button as the base to maintain accessibility/consistency. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure each major section rendered in App includes at least one visible CTA (using GradientCTAButton) per requirement.

requirements.summary: Add the About SolviroStudio section with exact copy, responsive illustration area, and a Learn More CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: About section contains the exact provided paragraph text.
About section includes a “Learn More” button that scrolls to Services or a deeper About content block on the same page.
About section includes an illustration/image area that displays on desktop and stacks nicely on mobile.

file_operations.description: Add the generated team illustration asset at the exact required path so it can be referenced by the About section.

Implement the “About SolviroStudio” section containing the exact provided text and a “Learn More” CTA that scrolls to Services (or a deeper About block). Include a responsive image/illustration area using frontend/public/assets/generated/team-illustration.dim_1400x900.png. Use shadcn-ui Card/Separator/Button as appropriate for clean layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire AboutSection into the page and ensure the Learn More CTA scroll target is correct.

requirements.summary: Add the Services section listing exactly three services with 1–2 sentence descriptions and an Explore Services CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: Services section lists the three services exactly by name.
Each service includes a 1–2 sentence description emphasizing solar companies and measurable outcomes.
Services section includes an “Explore Services” button (scrolling to Portfolio or Contact).

file_operations.description: Create the Services section listing exactly: (1) Meta Ads Management for Solar Companies, (2) Creative Design & Visual Campaigns, (3) ROI-Focused Lead Generation, each with a 1–2 sentence description. Add an “Explore Services” CTA that scrolls to Portfolio or Contact. Use shadcn-ui Card and Button for a professional grid. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire ServicesSection into the page order and ensure anchor id matches the nav item (Services).

requirements.summary: Add a Testimonials section with exact supporting text, 3–5 solar-focused quotes, and a consistent CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section includes 3–5 distinct quotes (written in English) that reference solar industry outcomes (leads, ROI, campaign performance).

requirements.summary: Add the Contact Us section with exact copy, email/phone placeholder, validated form, and a success state that submits via backend interface using React Query.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact section shows the exact provided text and the exact email address.
Form includes fields: name, email, optional phone, message; and a submit button labeled “Contact Me”.
Client-side validation prevents submission when required fields are empty/invalid and shows inline errors.
On successful submit, the UI shows a success confirmation and clears the form.
A backend endpoint exists to accept and store contact submissions (name, email, phone, message, timestamp) and the frontend calls it on submit.

file_operations.description: Add lightweight client-side validation helpers for the contact form (required fields, email format) and per-field error messaging.
Create a React Query mutation hook that calls the backendInterface submitContactForm capability and exposes loading/error/success state for the Contact form.

Implement the Contact Us section with the exact provided text, display solvirostudio@gmail.com, a phone placeholder, and a form (name, email, optional phone, message) with submit button label “Contact Me”. Validate required fields with inline errors and show a clear success state that clears the form. Use shadcn-ui Input/Textarea/Button/Alert components for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire ContactSection into the page order, ensure anchor id matches the nav item (Contact Us), and ensure all CTAs across the page scroll here.

requirements.summary: Incorporate the uploaded SolviroStudio logo in the header (optional footer), responsive and clickable to scroll to Home.
acceptanceCriteria: Header displays the uploaded logo image at an appropriate size on desktop and mobile.
Logo does not distort (maintains aspect ratio) and remains readable on the chosen header background.
Clicking the logo scrolls to the Home/Hero section.

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded SolviroStudio logo image as a static public asset (copy from the provided upload) so it can be referenced by the header.

Create a responsive site header that includes the SolviroStudio logo (from frontend/public/assets/solvirostudio-logo.png) and the sticky nav. Ensure the logo maintains aspect ratio and clicking it scrolls to the Home/Hero section. Use shadcn-ui components where appropriate (e.g., Button for mobile menu trigger if needed). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire SiteHeader into the top-level layout and ensure it remains sticky and visually consistent with the warm gradient theme.

requirements.summary: Apply a coherent professional theme (typography, spacing, separators, card styles) with neutral backgrounds and premium readability.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is applied consistently across all sections (typography scale, spacing rhythm, card/button styles).
Contrast/readability is maintained (accent gradients do not reduce legibility of text).
Overall look is modern, clean, and professional (not overly playful or cluttered).

file_operations.description: Define global typography defaults (font smoothing, base text colors), neutral background tones, and consistent section spacing/separators that keep the warm gradient accents premium and readable.
Refine the shared section wrapper to enforce consistent spacing rhythm, section headings, and optional divider treatments across all sections.
Centralize reusable theme constants (e.g., className strings for headings, cards, subtle backgrounds) to keep visual styling consistent without scattering one-off styles.
Ensure all sections use the shared theming primitives (SectionShell/ThemeTokens and shadcn-ui components) for consistent typography, spacing, and card/button styling.
